Class FixedAlphaBetaScore

java.lang.Object
org.monarchinitiative.phenol.analysis.mgsa.MgsaScoreBase
org.monarchinitiative.phenol.analysis.mgsa.MgsaScore
org.monarchinitiative.phenol.analysis.mgsa.FixedAlphaBetaScore
public class FixedAlphaBetaScore extends MgsaScore
Score of a setting in which alpha and beta are not known.
Author:
Sebastian Bauer
